Again <WG3825> I Say <WG3004> To You, <WG5213> That <WG3754> If <WG1437> Two <WG1417> Of You <WG5216> May Agree <WG4856> On <WG1909> The <WG3588> Earth <WG1093> Concerning <WG4012> Any <WG3956> Matter <WG4229> <WG3739> Whatever <WG1437> They Shall Ask, <WG154> It Shall Be Done <WG1096> To Them <WG846> From <WG3844> <WG3588> <WG3962> My Father <WG3450> Who Is <WG3588> In The <WG1722> Heavens. <WG3772>
